Record.definition: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE FUNCTION "PPM"."CMN_SEC_GET_PERMVAL_FCT" ( P_USER_ID IN NUMBER, P_OBJECT_ID IN NUMBER, P_OBJECT_INSTANCE_ID IN NUMBER ) RETURN NUMBER IS V_PERMISSION NUMBER; BEGIN /* User/Group permission function to compute permission value from individual permission element bit value (e.g. for READ=1,WRITE=2,DELETE=4 the value is 7) */ SELECT SUM (DISTINCT PERMISSION_VALUE) INTO V_PERMISSION FROM CMN_SEC_ASSGND_OBJ_PERM_V0 WHERE USER_ID = P_USER_ID AND OBJECT_ID = P_OBJECT_ID AND OBJECT_INSTANCE_ID = P_OBJECT_INSTANCE_ID; RETURN V_PERMISSION; EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN RETURN NULL; END;
